resources.string: The confirmation link will be sent to your email.
If you have paid for your order, please send a message to the service provider so that payment can be verified and your order can be processed.
Kindly check the payment and proceed the order.
Please mention your reasonable reason for cancelling the order.
Share your review and help others to make better choice!
Only one Gcash account can be added.
Please upload your transaction receipt. Thank you.
Enter Service Information. Eg: What kind of services included in this package?
I am looking for a team that has a creative idea for my prenup shoot.
All accounts on WeDo are both Buyer and Seller accounts by default.
Please email us if you have any query about the application.
We will reply within 2 working days.
What kind of listings are found on WeDo?

string.name: faq_buyerAns1
string.br: WeDo offers a wide range of professional bridal services in 7 main categories, namely Hair and Makeup, Dress Tailoring, Car, Venue, Flowers, Audio/Video, and Catering.\n
\n
You can find any professional services related to these 7 main categories on our platform.

resources.string: How do I find a service?

string.name: faq_buyerAns2
string.br: You can browse and explore various services through categories at the home page.\n
\n
You can also search using keywords by tapping on the search bar at each category page to find any related services on that category.

resources.string: Where do I find the lowest price services?

string.name: faq_buyerAns3
string.br: You can find lowest price services in WeDo under the ‘Lowest Price’ Section of the home page.\n
\n
The listings are showing all the services that equal or lower than 5000PHP.

resources.string: How do I find my recently viewed services?

string.name: faq_buyerAns4
string.br: You can find all the services that recently viewed through the home page under the ‘Recently Viewed’ section.\n
\n
It only will show the 10 latest recently viewed services.

string.name: faq_buyerAns5
string.br: Our Project Posting feature aims to help the client (buyer) to find the professional services they require.\n
\n
Instead of spending time sifting through the available services, you can submit details of your service requirements and allow the freelancer to contact you.\n
\n
If your project meets the criteria of the service provider(seller), the service provider will contact you through the chat.

resources.string: How do I post a Project?

string.name: faq_buyerAns6
string.br: You may tab on ‘Post Project’ at buyer account to start posting your project.\n
\n
You need to fill up the Project Title, Description, Budget and Target Date.\n
\n
At the same time, you also need to select the correct category of your project and lastly choose the status as ‘Open’.\n
\n
Once you successfully find a service provider for your project, you may update the status to ‘Closed’.\n
\n
Only the project in ‘Open’ status able to be seen by the service provider(seller).

resources.string: How do I manage my Project Post?

string.name: faq_buyerAns7
string.br: You can update all the information of your project, including the Project Title, Description, Budget, Category, Target Date and Status.\n
\n
You may update the status to Closed as you find a suitable service provider for your project.\n
\n
At the same time, you also need to select the correct category of your project and lastly choose the status as ‘Open’.\n
\n
You may also can update the status to Completed as your own record once your project is fully completed.\n
\n
If you would like to remove your Project Post, select the relevant service you want to delete and click the ‘Delete’ button.

resources.string: What kind of the payment method provided?

string.name: faq_buyerAns8
string.br: All the payment information has been included on the checkout page.\n
\n
However, you need to discuss with the service provider(seller) before make any payment for the services to avoid any inconvenience caused.

resources.string: How do I process the payment?

string.name: faq_buyerAns9
string.br: There are two ways of the payment process on WeDo.\n
\n
First, the payment only needs to be transferred after your project have been done by the service provider. You need to send the payment slip privately through the chat.\n
\n
Second, the half or full payment needs to be transferred to the service provider before your order can be proceed.\n
\n
You need to send the payment slip during your order checkout and then inform the service provider for order confirmed. Select “Choose File” and select your payment slip to submit your payment.\n

resources.string: What does the Order Status mean?

string.name: faq_buyerAns10
string.br: Pending: Waiting for the seller to accept your order.\n
\n
Work In Progress: The seller is working on your order.\n
\n
Completed: You have confirmed the order and need to transfer the payment to service provider (if relevant).\n
\n
Rated: You have rated the services.

resources.string: How do I change my Order Status?

string.name: faq_buyerAns11
string.br: You only can change the status on Work In Progress Order and Completed Order.\n
\n
Select the Work In Progress List, then click the button “Completed” to change the status from Work In Progress to Completed.\n
\n
Select the Completed List, and you can rate the order that have been completed.

resources.string: How to promote my services in WeDo platform?

string.name: faq_sellerAns1
string.br: If you are a service provider, you can publish your own professional service to WeDo platform.\n
\n
You need to fill up all the necessary information, such as the Service Title, Description, Category, Price and Delivery Hours.\n
\n
You also need to select a photo as your service’s cover photo.\n
\n
You can add the portfolio for every service (if applicable) after you successfully publish your service.

resources.string: How do I edit my services?

string.name: faq_sellerAns2
string.br: You can edit the services by clicking the button “Manage Services” at service provider account.\n
\n
Inside the “Manage Services”, 4 activities can be done.
\n
1. You can directly click on the service to view the detail. If want to delete the service, you can click on “Delete” button inside the detail page.\n
\n
2. You can add/edit the portfolio for each service.\n
\n
3. You can edit the service information, such as Title, Description, Category, Price, Delivery Days and Cover Photo.\n
\n
4. You can view all the reviews given by buyer for each of the service.

resources.string: Can I find the freelance job directly through WeDo platform?

string.name: faq_sellerAns3
string.br: Instead of Service Posting, you can also find a job through the job browsing.\n
\n
You can view all the project that posted by the buyer at the seller home page.\n
\n
If the project is fulfill your criteria, then you may contact privately through the chat feature to have the discussion with the client.

resources.string: How do I receive the payment from the buyer?

string.name: faq_sellerAns4
string.br: You need to add your own bank information for the payment purpose.\n
\n
Only one bank account can be added for each seller account.\n
\n
However, you can edit the bank information, such as Bank Name, Account Name and Account Number.\n
\n
All the bank information needs to be valid, so that the buyer can make the payment successfully.

resources.string: No payment slip has been uploaded.
